entries.title_d: This is a test convoy mission. :-)
entries.title: TEST CONVOY MISSION
entries.taunt_4: Join the attack! Slaugher them all!
entries.shields_depleted: My shields have been depleted! Help!
entries.ready_to_go: The convoy is all here. Open a comm channel to any of our ships to give the go order. We have a schedule to keep though so we won't wait all day.
entries.no_convoy: The full convoy hasn't arrived yet. We can't leave without the rest.
entries.lets_move: Alright boys, time to head out!
entries.hull_half: My hull is at half! Help!
entries.found_loc: Meet the convoy at the following location.
entries.convoy_ship_lost: One of the convoy ships has been lost! You need to tighten up and make sure the rest survive!
entries.convoy_safe: A convoy ship has safely jumped to lightspeed.
entries.convoy_destroyed: The convoy has been completely destroyed! This failure is unacceptable!
entries.attack_notify: A wing of hostile ships is approaching the convoy!
entries.arrived_at_loc: Wait at this location. The convoy will be exiting hyperspace momentarily.
entries.arrival_greeting: The rest of my ships aren't far behind. I'll let you know when we're ready to head out.
